answers.answer: Hello,There are many causes of nausea. These include stomach disorders such as gastroenteritis and gastritis, liver/gall bladder disease, cancer, medications, inner ear diseases like labrynthitis, ulcers/gastritis, metabolic like diabetes, hypothyroidism and adrenal diseases or neurological causes.I will sincerely advise you to consult a physician and get these possibilities ruled out one by one.I hope it helps. It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.
thanks for the info.. i will diff. keep you posted.. seein my doc soon..

question: I've been having the feeling of puking but nothing comes out but, split and burping every now and then.. i've been looking up all the symptoms.. and it all says, it has to do with being pergo.. i've already took 4 HPT's and i'm not prego.. to add i just had my period a few days ago.. i'm wondering if strsses can cause this? lmk.. i need answers.. thanks..
title: Puking??
